nodes.diffHunk:

 rule "Nanoleaf canvas touch detection Panel 2"

+    Item Panel2SingleTap changed from NULL to ON or

nodes.bodyText:
Not sure if I understand the change. Do you recommend to go from
    Item Panel1DoubleTap changed from OFF to ON or
    Item Panel1DoubleTap changed from NULL to ON

to
    Item Panel1DoubleTap changed from NULL to ON or
    Item Panel1DoubleTap changed from OFF to ON 

i.e. you switched the lines?
cheers
Stefan

nodes.bodyText: why did you increase the log-level?

Hi J-N-K,
Because it tells that a particular canvas panel which is comparable to a switch device was pressed by someone. It is important to know that this was happening in particular if someone happened to forget adding a discovered panel thing. The actual comparison of that action can be related to an added thing happens below and will only be logged on debug.
Does that help?
Stefan
